attributes.action: Seperate the north from the rest of england
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long, england has been weighed down by it's lesser cousins, Northern England. 
The province of york and it's surrounding scrubland has made england the laughing stock of the world and birthed forth MICK. This, in a global economy is unnexceptabe. A wall should be erected to remove the plague of northerners. in exchange we sould send food over to shut them up

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
